page.title: 07Colerne May Fayre
page.content:
Colerne has an annual event called the Colerne May Fayre. This has been going for twelve years. They always have a May Queen and her attendants. To choose the May Queen and her attendants for the May Fayre you put your name down and then you pull out a name from a hat, then that person is the May Queen. There is also a fancy dress competition, there are four age groups. They also have floats, this year(1985) there were ten floats. The winner had made a big Steam Train. It normally takes place on the third weekend in May.
As an extra event this year some of the children involved in this survey performed a set of stick dances. It is hoped that this will stay as a traditional event.
